body:
Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Caterpillar Inc. (Symbol: CAT), where a total of 93,093 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 9.3 million underlying shares. That amounts to about 260.5% of CAT's average daily trading volume over the past month of 3.6 million shares. Particularly high volume was seen for the $82.50 strike call option expiring January 20, 2017 , with 12,175 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 1.2 million underlying shares of CAT. Below is a chart showing CAT's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $82.50 strike highlighted in orange:

Stemline Therapeutics Inc (Symbol: STML) saw options trading volume of 3,392 contracts, representing approximately 339,200 underlying shares or approximately 185.2% of STML's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 183,160 shares. Particularly high volume was seen for the $22.50 strike call option expiring June 16, 2017 , with 1,043 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 104,300 underlying shares of STML. Below is a chart showing STML's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $22.50 strike highlighted in orange:

And Netflix Inc. (Symbol: NFLX) options are showing a volume of 104,638 contracts thus far today. That number of contracts represents approximately 10.5 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 166.5% of NFLX's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 6.3 million shares. Especially high volume was seen for the $120 strike put option expiring January 20, 2017 , with 4,386 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 438,600 underlying shares of NFLX. Below is a chart showing NFLX's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $120 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for CAT options STML options , or NFLX options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.

title: Noteworthy Tuesday Option Activity: CAT, STML, NFLX
